HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Dodání do 1-2 pracovních dnů od převzetí objednávky dopravcem.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.cod_surcharge: ZDARMA (při dobírce možná pouze platba hotově)

express_delivery.delivery_time: Při odeslání objednávky do 10 hod, vyzvednutí možné tentýž den.

SUMMARY: Emos.cz offers a range of delivery options within Czechia, all of which are provided free of charge. Home delivery is available through DPD, PPL, and Zásilkovna, with an estimated delivery time of 1-2 business days. Customers can also opt for delivery to parcel shops and parcel lockers (including Z-BOX, PBOX, AlzaBox) via the same providers. In-store pickup is an option at their Přerov location. For large or overweight orders, the company uses pallet transport. All payment methods, including cash on delivery, are free. NOTABLE FEATURES: The most significant feature is that all shipping and COD services are completely free, with no minimum order value mentioned. Same-day pickup is available for in-store collection in Přerov if the order is placed by 10:00. For pallet deliveries, COD payment is restricted to cash only. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented very clearly on a dedicated 'Doprava a platba' page. The details are easy to understand, and the pricing is transparent and highly favorable for the customer. The only minor omission is the lack of a specific delivery timeframe for pallet transport.
